Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is NMK. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 09 NMK. Key actors dealing with cheese in Maleshevija and the kew brands: a) Maleshevo milk Berovo b) Mlekara Malesh c) Mlekara Natasha d) Farma Pacarski . There are meny individual families involved in producing sheep;s cheese.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is Mountain Meleshevija. The reference mountain landscape of this VC is unspecified. Maleshevski mountains are located in the eastern part of the Republic of North Macedonia. The are covers the municipalities of Berovo and Pehchevo, and is characterized with the natural and cultural wealth. Two rivers cross the region, Bregalnica and Strumica. Forests covers 52% of the Maleshevija region, while pastures around 20%.   The size of the area (km2) is 806. The minimum altimetry of the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 660. The maximum altimetry of the LAU is 1932. The total population (in thousand) is 174.341. The population density (Inhabitants/km2) in the LAU is 49.3. The population change rate of the LAU in the last 10 years (%) has been -3.00%. The overall regional population density (Inhabitants/km2) is 83.4. The regional population change rate in the last 10 years (%) has been 1.20%.   The average per capita income (EUR/year) [Province] is 5056. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Province] is 769. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 9.80%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 45.60%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Province] is 44.53%. The per capita income (EUR/year) [Region] is 5175. The total Gross Value Added (GVA) (EUR million/year) [Region] is 9332. The primary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 9.75%. The secondary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 27.70%. The tertiary sector share of total GVA/year [Region] is 62.50%.   The total number of bed places (BPs) in tourist accommodations/year in the LAU (Local Administrative Unit) is 2088. The regional (Region) share of total BPs/year is unspecified. The number of agricultural holdings in the LAU is 26003. The nearest settlement with population over 100000 (km) is unspecified. In this region protected areas are present.   The primary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Province] is unspecified. The primary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 16.20%. The secondary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 30.50%. The tertiary sector share of total employment/year [Region] is 53.30%.   Agriculture is one of the basic economic activities in the region of Maleshevija. Sheep breeding is a traditional activity of Maleshevija, while Berovo cheese is well recognized as a quality product across the country and even beyond. There is further potential for development of the VC , mainly from the perspective of the market chain. Cheese is with a high quality, due to the cleaned environment in Maleshevija mountains. Maleshevski cheese is having a very good identity, and it is sold across the country. Very high demand for this product.   The sheep number is rapidly decreasing, and this is a big issue in the region. There are less interested people to deal with the sheep, and very hardly to find human capacities in the industry, including shepherds. In some cases, the market is not well consolidated, and the cheese might be sold on the grey market. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is unspecified. Cheese is used widely in other final products, mainly in catering. The new processes and the technology applied for producing this product. The innovation is related to New products and New processes. The land use systems involved are Grassland, Forestry and Natural land. The local assets include Social and cultural.   cheese VC, is also present in other Member States.
